programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n)

programme.title: Richard Lewis / Gilbert Gottfried
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Richard Lewis and Gilbert Gottfried(n)

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: Punching Henry
programme.desc: A journeyman comedian (Henry Phillips) is lured to L.A. by a TV producer (J.K. Simmons) who wants to make him a reality star. As reality sets in, he must decide whether his legacy will be to tell jokes for a living or become the butt of them, in this glimpse behind the weird world of comedy. Sarah Silverman, Tig Notaro, Jim Jefferies and Doug Stanhope also star(n)

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans(n)

programme.title: American Graffiti
programme.desc: Coming of age classic, directed by George Lucas, following four teenagers in the early 60s on their last summer night before college, as they explore drag racing, romance, drive ins and experience America's last age of innocence. Stars Harrison Ford, Richard Dreyfuss and Ron Howard(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman(n)

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire(n)

programme.title: Winter Passing
programme.desc: In this dramatic comedy, Zooey Deschanel stars as a struggling twenty-something actress who goes in search of her legendary, reclusive novelist father and must wrestle with his unconventional new family and their shared past. Also stars Ed Harris and Will Ferrell(n)

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration(n)

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Season 2 finale. Carrie must decide what her heart really wants. Brody shares a drink with Faber to discuss the future of his family. Saul is tasked with a secret mission and Quinn makes a decision that may change everything

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a man now reunited with the mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her not knowing who or what she is

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in the men's room of a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia po­lice captain (Harrison Ford) assigned to the case discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation. He fears for his own life, and the lives of the boy and his mother and they flee to a Lancaster County farm. The detective becomes ro­mantically attached to the young mother, while she, because of her Amish upbringing, must suppress the attraction she feels for him

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous (2008)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this remake of the action classic about a lethal assassin who travels to Bangkok to perform a quartet of hits but falls in love with a beautiful, deaf pharmacist, and takes a young hustler under his wing as a protege. Charlie Yeung costars in this stylish thriller

programme.title: An Eye For Beauty
programme.desc: Luc is a brilliant young architect with a budding reputation. Opinionated, charming and confident, he lives with his beautiful wife in the stunning countryside of Quebec. Luc's seemingly perfect life begins to fall apart, however, when he meets and falls for a mysterious woman during a business trip. Caught in a triangle of emotions, he puts everything in jeopardy to pursue his affair, including the life he has built and the woman he loves

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars as an assassin who hides out in an idyllic Italian town, performing one last hit before leaving the death trade in this elegiac thriller from director Anton Corbijn

programme.title: Gary Owen: I Got My Associates
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Gary Owen shares stories of being married to the daughter of a founding member of the Black Panthers, being the father of young teenagers and, of course, his hillbilly family. Filmed at the Stardome in Hoover, Alabama, the special also includes Gary recounting his time in the military, celebrity weddings and bumping into Lebron James in the bathroom(n)

programme.title: The Alamo (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Awards® winners Billy Bob Thornton and Dennis Quaid star in this historical epic set in 19th century Texas during the famed siege of Alamo, where a group of men led by Colonel Travis, along with Davey Crockett and Jim Bowie, fought against the odds, for the independence of Texas(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A shunned Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: In this buddy drama, a Vietnam vet and his grumpy yet lovable sidekick team up to find the killer of a young boxer and clean up the streets of LA only to be drawn into an international crime ring. Stars Danny Trejo and Danny Glover(n)

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars as an assassin who hides out in an idyllic Italian town, performing one last hit before leaving the death trade in this elegiac thriller from director Anton Corbijn(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress(n)

programme.title: Finding Vivian Maier
programme.desc: Documentary about mysterious nanny Vivian Maier, who secretly took over 100,000 photographs that were hidden in storage lockers to be discovered decades later, and is now considered among the 20th century's greatest photographers. Her strange and riveting life and art is revealed through never before seen photographs, films, and interviews with dozens who thought they knew her(n)

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: A novice con man (Robert Redford) teams up with an acknowledged master (Paul Newman) to avenge the murder of a mutual friend by pulling off the ultimate big con and swindling a fortune from a mobster (Robert Shaw) in director George Roy Hill's Academy Award® winning Best Picture(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star(n)

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: In his first ever stand-up comedy special, Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: A notorious 1971 bank robbery in London is the basis for this exciting, suspenseful thriller starring Jason Statham as a car dealer who agrees to the dangerous heist in order to finance a new family but gets more than he bargains for when the break-in yields not just riches but a slew of valuable state secrets. Saffron Burrows costars in this exciting crime thriller from director Roger Donaldson(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck(n)

programme.title: Hesher
programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt stars as in this coming-of-age story as a metal head who unexpectedly enters the life of a grieving family and takes on the unlikely role of helping a 13-year-old boy cope with the death of his mother(n)

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: A novice con man (Robert Redford) teams up with an acknowledged master (Paul Newman) to avenge the murder of a mutual friend by pulling off the ultimate big con and swindling a fortune from a mobster (Robert Shaw) in director George Roy Hill's Academy Award® winning Best Picture(n)
Series host Provenza welcomes guest panelists Richard Belzer, Dave Attell, Janeane Garofalo, Doug Stanhope and Glenn Wool(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct(n)

programme.title: The Face of Love
programme.desc: Five years after the death of her beloved husband, a woman meets a man who seems to be his exact replica. As she falls for this stranger, she can't bring herself to tell him the truth about what attracted her but the it must come out. Stars Annette Bening, Ed Harris and Robin Williams(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury(n)

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed(n)

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: A real-life medical phenomenon forms the basis of this gripping psychological thriller about a young man who is paralyzed on an operating table by anesthesia but totally conscious and able to feel everything his surgeon is doing. Hayden Christensen, Jessica Alba and Terrence Howard star(n)

programme.title: Sins of Our Youth
programme.desc: Four teenagers accidentally kill a young boy while firing assault weapons recreationally. In their moment of desperation, paranoia and fear that their lives are over, the youths drunkenly construct a chilling plan reminiscent of a video game plot: they will hunt each other down until only one is left standing. Now, with the clock ticking, each young man must come to terms with their actions and decide how far they are willing to go(n)

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive(n)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: It's the 1860s, the Civil War is underway, and the country is torn apart and on the brink of chaos. For the inhabitants of Manhattan's Five Points, a war is also raging closer to home. Amsterdam Vallon (Leonardo Dicaprio), a young Irish-American immigrant, is released from prison after fifteen years. He returns to Five Points bent on revenge against Bill the Butcher (Daniel Day-Lewis), the powerful anti-immigrant gang leader who killed Amsterdam's father. Directed by Martin Scorsese

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: A notorious 1971 bank robbery in London is the basis for this exciting, suspenseful thriller starring Jason Statham as a car dealer who agrees to the dangerous heist in order to finance a new family but gets more than he bargains for when the break-in yields not just riches but a slew of valuable state secrets. Saffron Burrows costars in this exciting crime thriller from director Roger Donaldson

programme.title: Winter Wonderlust
programme.desc: A few too many cocktails turn Marisa and Brian's blind date into an overnight stay. Foiled by an ice storm, they then get unexpectedly stuck together over a holiday weekend. With nothing else to do but get to know one another, they learn that sometimes first impressions are quite wrong

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Robert De Niro as career criminal Nick Wells, a safecracking specialist who allows himself to be pressured into one more heist by his flamboyant mentor (Marlon Brando) and a brilliant but impatient young thief (Edward Norton). Soon they're embroiled in a complex scheme to steal a priceless relic from a Canadian customs house, but revealed secrets and double-crosses are just around the corner

programme.title: SHOWTIME BOXING: Special Edition: Benavidez vs. Gavril
programme.desc: 20 year-old rising star David Benavidez (18-0, 17 KOs) and hard-hitting contender Ronald Gavril (18-1, 14 KOs) battle it out for the vacant super middleweight championship. Plus, two 10-round super middleweight showdowns: J'Leon Love (23-1, 13 KOs) goes up against Texas-native Abraham Han (26-3, 16 KOs) and undefeated prospect Caleb Plant (15-0, 10 KOs)takes on Andrew Hernandez (19-6-1, 9 KOs). Live from The Joint at Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas(c)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive

programme.title: Child's Play 2
programme.desc: Chucky's back in this sequel that picks up where the first one left off. Chucky's toy company rebuilds the doll in an attempt to prove that there is nothing wrong with it. Chucky then goes on a rampage, slicing and dicing with his unique brand of dark comedy, and horrifyingly escalating the violence over the original

programme.title: Child's Play 3
programme.desc: Third time's the charm for Chucky. Young Andy has grown up and attends a military school - too bad the killer doll still wants his soul. Thrills abound as Chucky stalks Andy relentlessly and murders with even more wit

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Action film series starring Danny Glover and Danny Trejo as senior heroes who visit Louisiana for a wedding escape only to encounter violence and mayhem, and once again, must pursue their own form of justice

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Jet Li stars as real life martial arts legend Huo Yuanjia, who becomes the most famous and revered fighter in all of China. Along the way, he creates the Jin Wu Sports Federation, and comes to be it's spiritual guru(n)

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme is Chance Boudreaux, a New Orleans merchant sailor who uses his martial arts skills to battle a band of hunters preying on homeless veterans in a deadly safari game. The organizers of the safari, Emil (Lance Henriksen) and Pik (Arnold Vosloo), are former mercenaries who devise their murderous game purely as a business venture. This leads to a deadly contest between Emil and Chance, which spans from the streets of New Orleans to the treacherous Louisiana bayous(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe(n)

programme.title: Andrew Santino: Home Field Advantage
programme.desc: Half Mick, half WOP, hard-headed comedian Andrew Santino returns to his Chicago hometown for a stand-up special with the authentic taste of a city made of Italian beef, Old Style and deep dish. Shot at the historic Vic Theater, Santino touches on everything from growing up thinking he was black and a disgust with bachelorette parties, to his bouts with severe acne and male porn stars envy(n)

programme.title: Steve-O: Guilty As Charged
programme.desc: Comedy special starring comedian, author and all-round lunatic Steve-O, who went from humble beginnings as a circus clown to hitting the big time in 'Jackass'. Expect the unexpected as he performs hilariously outrageous stunts and riotous tricks that hold nothing back(n)

programme.title: Sins of Our Youth
programme.desc: Four teenagers accidentally kill a young boy while firing assault weapons recreationally. In their moment of desperation, paranoia and fear that their lives are over, the youths drunkenly construct a chilling plan reminiscent of a video game plot: they will hunt each other down until only one is left standing. Now, with the clock ticking, each young man must come to terms with their actions and decide how far they are willing to go(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance(n)

programme.title: A Game of Honor
programme.desc: This feature length documentary captures a never-before-seen look at the Division 1 football teams at the U.S. Military Academy at West Point and the U.S. Naval Academy at Annapolis, rigorous programs of military training, elite classroom education and athletic preparation for their cadets and midshipmen that culminates each year in the Army-Navy Football Game, an institution in American sports(n)

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen(n)

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent(n)

programme.title: Cold Creek Manor
programme.desc: Cooper Tilson (Dennis Quaid) and his wife Leah (Golden Globe winner Sharon Stone) are New Yorkers wanting to escape city life for the saner, safer countryside. They move their two children into a dilapidated old mansion filled with the possessions of the previous family. Turning it into their dream house becomes a living nightmare when the previous owner (Stephen Dorff) shows up, and a series of terrifying incidents leads them on a search for clues to the estate's dark and lurid past(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water! The beach-goers of Amity are threatened again by a giant, man-eating shark in this thrilling sequel to Spielberg's masterpiece. When signs of a new man-eater begin to wash up, Police Chief Brody must convince the town of the danger and kill the monster. Oscar nominee Roy Scheider returns along with the famous John Williams score(n)

programme.title: Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: While suffering from amnesia, Kazuya Mishima is kidnapped by an underground crime syndicate and forced to become a ruthless assassin. Awoken in the outskirts of Tekken city, Kazuya must traverse the unknown world to unravel the secrets and lies the city holds. Kazuya must solve the mysteries hidden behind his life(n)

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure(n)

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent(n)

programme.title: SHOWTIME BOXING: Special Edition: Benavidez vs. Gavril
programme.desc: 20 year-old rising star David Benavidez (18-0, 17 KOs) and hard-hitting contender Ronald Gavril (18-1, 14 KOs) battle it out for the vacant super middleweight championship. Plus, two 10-round super middleweight showdowns: J'Leon Love (23-1, 13 KOs) goes up against Texas-native Abraham Han (26-3, 16 KOs) and undefeated prospect Caleb Plant (15-0, 10 KOs)takes on Andrew Hernandez (19-6-1, 9 KOs). Live from The Joint at Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas(n)

programme.title: A Season With Navy Football: Episode 1
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to Coach Ken Niumatalolo and the USNA Midshipmen as they take on the Florida Atlantic Owls. Season premiere(n)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. He is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Jack Ford follows Chris Mullin as the basketball legend returns to St. John's - this time as coach. Plus, Mark Phillips dives into "Florentine Football," an organized, bloody street brawl that takes place each June in an Italian city known more for its art and culture. And if only Rubin "Hurricane" Carter could have lived to see it: Armen Keteyian reports on David McCallum, who was exonerated after serving 29 years - mainly because the former boxer interceded on his behalf(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: As concussions become a major issue in football, Steve Kroft checks in with parents who are wondering whether to allow their children to play the contact sport. Armen Keteyian interviews anti-trust lawyer Jeffrey Kessler, whose suit against the NCAA has just been granted class action status. Plus, Lesley Stahl reports on basketball leagues - and lengthy schedules - for kids as young as five. And David Martin follows top climber Sasha DiGiulian as she ascends the treacherous north face of the Eiger(n)

programme.title: Risk
programme.desc: In the new world order where a single keystroke can alter history, WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange is undeterred - even as the legal jeopardy he faces threatens to undermine the organization he leads and fracture the movement he inspired. Capturing this story with unprecedented access, Academy Award® winning director Laura Poitras finds herself caught between the motives and contradictions of Assange and his inner circle in a documentary portrait of power, betrayal, truth and sacrifice(n)

programme.title: Open Range
programme.desc: Four men trying to escape their pasts drive cattle and live off the land on an open range. When they are threatened by a corrupt lawman, one of the men, a former gunslinger, is forced to take up arms again(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: At Sea World of Florida, an ingenious new Undersea Kingdom is about to open. A maze of transparent tunnels, beneath the park's lagoon, takes visitors through a teeming world of exotic sea life. There is also an uninvited guest however. Entering through a damaged sea gate, separating the park from the ocean, a great white shark becomes trapped in the lagoon. Panic spreads through the holiday crowd. In a primal frenzy, the shark devours anything which prevents its escape(n)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself(n)

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice(n)

programme.title: Open Range
programme.desc: Four men trying to escape their pasts drive cattle and live off the land on an open range. When they are threatened by a corrupt lawman, one of the men, a former gunslinger, is forced to take up arms again(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: In this buddy drama, a Vietnam vet and his grumpy yet lovable sidekick team up to find the killer of a young boxer and clean up the streets of LA only to be drawn into an international crime ring. Stars Danny Trejo and Danny Glover(n)

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident(n)

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: A novice con man (Robert Redford) teams up with an acknowledged master (Paul Newman) to avenge the murder of a mutual friend by pulling off the ultimate big con and swindling a fortune from a mobster (Robert Shaw) in director George Roy Hill's Academy Award® winning Best Picture

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

She's soon at work on a tell-all biography while he's off to communist Cuba, where he bungles his way into an actual covert operation with a real-life "spook" bent on taking down national leader Fidel Castro. Douglas McGrath, John Turturro and Sigourney Weaver star in this raucous political farce(n)

Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog - along with Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo and a motley crew of Muppets - embarks on a cross-country trip to find fame in Hollywood while eluding the grasp of a relentless frog-leg restauranteur(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct(n)

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets(n)

programme.title: I Am David
programme.desc: A young boy named David (Ben Tibber) flees a Communist prison camp in 1950's Bulgaria and embarks on a remarkable cross-cultural odyssey to deliver a letter to a stranger in Denmark. James Caviezel and Joan Plowright costar in this moving drama based on the novel "North to Freedom" by Anne Holm and directed by Paul Feig of TV's "Freaks and Geeks."(n)

programme.title: Daft Punk Unchained
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the pop culture phenomenon of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, which pulls back the masks of the Grammy award winning French musicians, who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film(n)

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?(n)

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people(n)

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: Hallie Parker, a hip Californian, and Annie James, a proper London miss (both played by Lindsay Lohan) are identical twins who don't even know each other exist - until they accidentally meet at summer camp. Now they're up to their freckles in schemes and dreams to switch places, get their parents (Dennis Quaid and Natasha Richardson) back together, and have the family they've always wished for

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Heartbreakers (2001)
programme.desc: Experts at seducing and fleecing wealthy men, mother-daughter grifters Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt arrive in Palm Beach, Florida, where they target an aging tobacco baron (Gene Hackman) and the owner (Jason Lee) of a beachside tavern. Ray Liotta, Anne Bancroft and Nora Dunn costar in this comedy from the writer of "Liar Liar."

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Ben (Ben Affleck) has to get from New York to Savannah for his wedding. Everything is under control, until a young woman named Sarah (Sandra Bullock) literally falls into his life. Ben and Sarah's plane goes skidding off the runway and he inadvertently saves Sarah's life, only to find that he has inherited an unlikely travel companion. After being detained, derailed and disrobed, Ben realizes that he's developing a definite attraction to the sexy and impetuous Sarah and the feeling is decidedly mutual

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Marcia Gay Harden stars as a librarian who travels to Costa Rica to escape her mid-life crisis and finds herself on an unexpected journey filled with adventure and romance

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum)

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n)

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno(n)

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City(n)

programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years(n)

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: A vulgar womanizer offers himself to jilted men as a "rebound guy" who will send their ex-lovers running back into their arms, but meets his match in the brassy former girlfriend of his best buddy. Dane Cook, Kate Hudson and Jason Biggs star in this romantic comedy(n)

Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with(n)

programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: Bullitt
programme.desc: A lone-wolf San Francisco police detective tracks syndicate killers after failing to protect a mob informant, while an ambitious senator strives to shut down his investigation. Features one of the screen's all-time great car chases. (cc)

programme.title: For Pete's Sake
programme.desc: Slapstick farce with Barbra Streisand as a housewife trying to finance her cab-driving husband's education. Peter: Michael Sarrazin. Helen: Estelle Parsons. Fred: William Redfield. Mrs. Cherry: Molly Picon. Nick: Louis Zorich. Loretta: Vivian Bonnell. Bernie: Richard Ward. Coates: Joseph Maher. Directed by Peter Yates. (cc)

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: An aging Shakespearean actor tours the British theater on the verge of a nervous breakdown. His closest companion is his fiercely loyal homosexual dresser, who has come to love him. (cc)

programme.title: Belladonna of Sadness
programme.desc: A peasant woman makes a pact with the devil after she's banished from her village in order to gain magical powers and get revenge on those who wronged her

programme.title: Fantastic Planet
programme.desc: Cult film about earthlings subjugated by mechanized giants. Based on Stefan Wul's 1957 novel “Oms en Serie.” Directed by Rene Laloux

programme.title: Distant Drummer A Movable Scene
programme.desc: This examination of drugs focuses on the subculture surrounding illicit substances and features interviews with physicians who explain how users have developed alternate ways of getting high. (cc)

programme.title: Vienna The Years Remembered
programme.desc: A promotional short for the 1968 historical costume drama "Mayerling," about an affair between a prince (Omar Sharif) and a baroness (Catherine Deneuve), goes behind the scenes for a look at Austrian film locations(c)

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A ranch foreman is at odds with his wastrel foster brother. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Nostradamus and the Queen
programme.desc: A look at Nostradamus's prophecies about Catherine de Medici, the wife of France's King Henry II(c)

programme.title: Land of the Pharaohs
programme.desc: Historical epic about an Egyptian ruler who orders and oversees the building of a magnificent, thief-proof tomb for himself, and the scheming wife who puts him there. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Visiting Italy
programme.desc: "Traveltalks" stops in Italy for a look at the ancient ruins in Rome, the leaning tower of Pisa and the architecture of Florence. Narrated by James A. Fitzpatrick(c)

programme.title: 711 Ocean Drive
programme.desc: A telephone repairman's electronics savvy earns him a job with a crime ring and he rises to the top of a bookmaking operation, where he eventually runs afoul of an Eastern gambling syndicate. The film features a slam-bang finale atop Boulder Dam. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Land of Tradition
programme.desc: England is visited. Included: Windsor Castle; the race course in Ascot; Runnymede, where the Magna Carta was signed in 1215; cathedrals in Lincoln, Wells and Salisbury; the ancient ruins at Stonehenge. Narrated by James A. Fitzpatrick(c)

programme.title: My Forbidden Past
programme.desc: A débutante falls for a common doctor, but her family disapproves of the match. When she eventually inherits their fortune, she makes another play for her lost love. (cc)

programme.title: It Should Happen to You
programme.desc: Judy Holliday is a delight in this farce about an unsuccessful model who believes her career needs a jolt of publicity, so she rents a billboard in Manhattan, emblazoned with her name on it, and sees the endorsements pour in as well as the suitors. Jack Lemmon made his screen debut as Holliday's "unofficial" boyfriend. (cc)

programme.title: Auntie Mame
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee is about a young impressionable orphan who receives a dizzyingly wild upbringing from his eccentric madcap aunt who detests nonsense in others but loves it in herself. The script is based on Patrick Dennis' autobiographical novel that also spawned a Broadway hit and was made into a movie musical in 1974. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Sex and the Single Girl
programme.desc: A magazine writer sets out to expose a sex-research psychologist who has written a successful book for single women, but first he has to score an interview. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Desert Killer
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated short about a young Native American in Arizona who seeks professional help when a cougar threatens his flock of sheep(c)

programme.title: Blood and Sand
programme.desc: Colorful version of Ibanez's novel about a young bullfighter (Tyrone Power), his women (Linda Darnell and Rita Hayworth) and his dangerous profession. Anthony Quinn. Encarnacion: Lynn Bari. Senora Augustias: Nazimova. Garabato: J. Carrol Naish. Lopez: Monty Banks. Curro: Laird Cregar. El Nacional: John Carradine. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Blackbeard, the Pirate
programme.desc: On the 17th-century Spanish Main, a British surgeon attempts to stop a feared buccaneer by allowing himself to be kidnapped by the man's crew, only to discovers that the menace has also abducted a rival's daughter. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Three Musketeers

programme.title: Charulata
programme.desc: Acclaimed Indian director Satyajit Ray's poignant study of a lonely wife (Madhabi Mukherjee) in Victorian Calcutta who flirts with her husband's handsome cousin. Amal: Soumitra Chatterjee. Bhupati: Shailen Mukherjee. Umapada: Shyamal Ghoshal(n)

programme.title: The Coward
programme.desc: A stranded screenwriter finds out that his long-lost love is married to the man who offers him shelter(n)

programme.title: MGM Parade
programme.desc: Judy Garland sings "You Made Me Love You," from "Broadway Melody of 1938." Also: clips from "Broadway Melody of 1940," with Fred Astaire, and "It's Always Fair Weather," with Cyd Charisse. George Murphy is the host(n)

programme.title: Speak Easily
programme.desc: After inheriting a million dollars, a professor (Buster Keaton) puts a broken-down musical troupe on Broadway. Jimmy Durante. Pansy: Ruth Selwyn. Mrs. Peets: Hedda Hopper. Eleanor: Thelma Todd. Edward Sedgwick directed. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mills Blue Rhythm Band
programme.desc: A cavalcade of song-and-dance artists perform at a nightclub and a rent party. Numbers include "Blue Rhythm," "Love Is the Thing" and "Underneath the Harlem Moon." Directed by Roy Mack(n)

programme.title: Meet the Baron
programme.desc: More adventures of the fabulist Baron Munchhausen and his clumsy servants,beginning in Africa and ending at a women's college. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Audition
programme.desc: Featuring performances by Phil Emerton's Band, singer Hannah Williams and the tap-dance duo Larry & Larry(n)

programme.title: What! No Beer?
programme.desc: A fast talker sways a taxidirmist to invest in a brewery as the repeal of Prohibition draws near. But the clueless taxidirmist falls in love with a gangster's moll and makes deals with dangerous criminals without realizing who they are. (cc)(n)

programme.title: 42nd Street Special
programme.desc: Promotional short for the 1933 Warner Bros. musical "42nd Street," featuring a seven-car train dubbed the 42nd Street Special. Roosevelt(n)

programme.title: Strictly Dynamite
programme.desc: A poet is maneuvered into writing gags for a comic. James Durante, Lupe Velez. Nick: Norman Foster. Sylvia: Marian Nixon. Sam: Eugene Pallette. Mill: Minna Gombell. Specialty: Mills Brothers. Funny. Elliott Nugent directed(n)

programme.title: Bone Crushers
programme.desc: Short examines the world of professional wrestling(n)

programme.title: Student Tour

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire

programme.desc: Michael's so excited about a basketball game he's watching on TV that he accidentally tapes over Kady's first steps. What to do? Reenact them, with the reluctant assistance of Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey). Stevie: Taylor Negron. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Betty White guest stars as the maid Jay hires to replace her while she's away in Florida. Jay might have it tough when she returns, because the woman's an excellent cook and seamstress. She's also uncommonly adept at auto mechanics and TV repair. She can even beat Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey) at chess. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael doesn't think that modeling's a wise career choice for Claire, but when an agent (Carole Davis) tells him he has the perfect equipment to be a hand model, he thinks it's fine for him. Meanwhile, Kady's spending time with a girl named Rachel (Liliana Mumy), making Franklin very jealous. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Shawn falls for an older woman, while Marlon meets a thrill-seeker and finds that love is a hop, skip and bungee jump away (unless he wimps out). Erica: Pam Grier. Ina: Dominique Jennings. Edgar: Steven Anthony Jones. Shawn: Shawn Wayans. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Shawn becomes Marlon's agent and undermines his client's sputtering acting career by demanding the full star treatment. Meanwhile, Pops tries to foist spoiled food on the church mission. Franco: Steve Vinovich. Shawn: Shawn Wayans. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Pops browbeats the boys into going camping, but he's hurt to find their idea of "quality time" is partying with babes in the woods. Pops: John Witherspoon. T.C.: Phill Lewis. Dupree: Jermaine Hopkins. Shawn: Shawn Wayans. Marlon: Marlon Wayans. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: In a twist on "It's a Wonderful Life," Marlon sees how the family would have fared had he never been born. Not half badly, actually. Marlon: Marlon Wayans. Guardian Angel: Shawn Wayans. Dupree: Jermaine Hopkins. T.C.: Phill Lewis. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Boyz II Men star in a holiday episode about Will's scheme to get the group to perform at Nicky's christening. Vy: Vernee Watson-Johnson. Helen: Jenifer Lewis. Vivian: Daphne Maxwell Reid. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will (Will Smith) pays for putting off studying for a midterm until the last minute, and Ashley (Tatyana M. Ali) pays for staying out late on her first date. Philip: James Avery. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Moniece and Alexis' social media beef spills into the streets. Teairra's behavior at Nikki Baby's event leads to an emotional confrontation. Ray J. goes to extreme lengths to show Princess he's ready for fatherhood. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Don starts his new career as a piercer at 9Mag. Charmaine's mom gives her devastating news. Phor attempts to reconnect with family. Cobra is attracted to her new roommate. Nikki goes ballistic. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Don freaks out after Ashley gives him shocking news. Lily and Cobra come to blows. Van struggles to deal with the fallout from his breakup. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Baller Wives
programme.desc: With their ongoing beef driving their husband's friendship apart, Kijafa and Stacey get pressured to resolve their differences. Jeniva hosts her first fashion event. Miko confronts Kijafa's friend Carmena for throwing a drink on Stacey. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Mayhem erupts at Safaree and Chanel's music video shoot. Misster Ray's attempt to make nice with Masika leads to a wild encounter with Zell. A betrayed Teairra lashes out at Cisco, Moniece, and Nia. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: It's “game night” at the Kyle house, but it isn't exactly fun and games when the couples play “What Do You Know?” “What You Don't Know” would be more like it. “There's this weird energy here,” moans Michael. Vanessa: Brooklyn Sudano. Jasmine: Ella Joyce. Calvin: Rasta. Tony: Andrew McFarlane. Franklin: Noah Gray-Cabey. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part 1 of two. Vanessa (Brooklyn Sudano) is more than a little bit pregnant. In fact, she's a week overdue. She wants a natural childbirth at home, presided over by a new-agey midwife named Summer Breeze (Kelly Coffield). Fat chance of that happening. Meanwhile, Claire suspects Kady of pilfering her perfume and lipstick. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Conclusion. Following Vanessa's false labor (and the chaos it caused), Michael scripts a “game plan” for the real thing. “This has to work like clockwork,” he declares. Meanwhile, Claire and Kady, having made up, go off on a shopping spree together. Vanessa: Brooklyn Sudano. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia.
